data.title: Contact Us
data.meta_description: We always appreciate hearing from you at West Virginia Public Broadcasting! To contact us, call 1-888-596-9729 or fill out the form at the bottom of this
data.text:
We always appreciate hearing from you at West Virginia Public Broadcasting! To contact us, call 1-888-596-9729 or fill out the form at the bottom of this page to send us your comments or questions.

Like to sign up for our Newsletter? Sign up here.

Reception Problem? Let us know by filling out our contact form at the bottom of this page.

Notice a problem with our Closed Captioning? Report it here.

Have a news tip? Reach out to our news team at news@wvpublic.org.

If you find broken links, missing bylines, or missing audio/photos/graphics for any of our news stories, please alert us by sending an email to digital@wvpublic.org. Please include the URL in question.

You can reach us directly at the address and phone number below:

West Virginia Public Broadcasting

600 Capitol StreetCharleston, WV 25301

304-556-4900 or 1-888-596-9729

West Virginia Public Broadcasting delivers radio and television content across the entire state of West Virginia and in different ways in each community. If you are writing to tell us about an issue receiving our content, it’s important you provide enough details for us to expedite tracking down the problem.

Please provide us with this information:

Where do you live?

Are you listening to radio or watching television?

If radio, what transmitter do you listen to, or are you streaming from the website or an app?

If TV, do you watch over the air with an antenna, or are you watching on a cable or a satellite service?

If you are watching via a cable/satellite provider, what is the name of the cable system or satellite service?
